title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs packaged as a single Go binary with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama endpoints as standard LangChain LLM and Chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat interface, model manager, RAG, dark mode) that connects to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & reactive APIs for chat, generate, pull and list operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with readline, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion agent for VS Code via custom extension.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation stack using Chroma + Ollama embeddings and chat models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API; idiomatic Nim procedures for chat, generate, pull, delete and listing.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings and streaming with async/await.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama REST endpoints; includes chat, generate and model management.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container with chosen model pre-pulled for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that proxies Slack messages to Ollama and streams responses back into channel threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for summarizing and Q&A on notes.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library wrapping Ollama REST API; provides GenServer-based client with telemetry and retries.

title: ollama-r/lang
summary: R interface to Ollama; exposes chat and generate endpoints as R functions with native data-frame support.
